The All-Nighter: Cinemascope - included The Good, The Bad, and the Ugly, The Parallax View, It’s Always Fair Weather, The Hidden Fortress

The Best of the Hawaii International Film Festival - included Yellow Earth, Spices, Mandala, Our Sweet Days of Youth, Butterfly and Flower

Censorship - included Baby Face, Born to Be Bad, A Kiss Before the Mirror, Wives Under Suspicion, The Story of Temple Drake, Night Nurse, Desire

Coping with the Production Code: William K. Everson Presents Hollywood in the Age of

Film Poster Exhibition and Auction

Golden Space Needle Awards

Peter Greenaway: The Early Works

The Seattle International Film Festival Salutes the Seattle Foundation For the Motion Picture Arts: It Happened One Night at the Fifth Avenue Theatre

The Secret Festival

Seminar–From Script to Screen - panelists included Stewart Stern, Monte Hellman, Alan Rudolph, Robert M. Young, David Blocker, Jeff Dowd, Dan Ireland

The Unseen Welles - included The Filming of Othello, Othello, The Fountain of Youth
